## `ExcludeFileAddress` {#batch-excludefileaddress}

Specifies whether to exclude filepaths and URLs.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeFileAddress(boolean exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`boolean` exclude | `true` to exclude filepaths and URLs.
